name: Cracked Dagger
description: A small blade with a dangerous point and an unreliable handle.

name: Cudgel
description: A thick stick that makes problems stop moving.

name: Farmer's Pitchfork
description: Not elegant—just effective when you keep them at arm's length.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A dull blade, but better than bare hands.

name: Stone Sling
description: A strip of leather and a pocket of stones.

name: Wooden Club
description: A crude length of wood, barely worthy of the name weapon.

name: Hunting Knife
description: Built for skinning game, but it will do in a fight.

name: Rusted Mace
description: Heavy, pitted iron that still hits like a brick.

name: Sharpened Stake
description: A hard-wood stake sharpened to a wicked tip.

name: Worn Hatchet
description: A camp tool repurposed as a weapon.

name: Old Shortbow
description: Warped wood and frayed string, but arrows are arrows.

name: Short Sword
description: A balanced blade favored by inexperienced adventurers.

name: Splintered Spear
description: A long reach with a cracked shaft.

name: Iron Sword
description: A solid iron blade. Reliable and deadly.

name: Steel Dagger
description: Short, fast, and surprisingly lethal in the right hands.

name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy axe that bites deep and doesn't care about shields.

name: Long Sword
description: A longer blade with better leverage and reach.

name: Reinforced Spear
description: Banding and rivets keep it from snapping at the worst time.

name: Cavalry Sabre
description: A curved blade made for decisive cuts.

name: Flanged Mace
description: Designed to dent metal and ruin someone's day.

name: Composite Bow
description: Layered horn and wood for better punch.

name: Iron War Pick
description: A spike built to find gaps in armor.

name: Runic Staff
description: Etched with simple runes that hum faintly in your grip.

name: Heavy Crossbow
description: Slow to reload, fast to end arguments.

name: Steel Sword
description: Well-forged steel that bites deep into armor.

name: Duelist's Rapier
description: A needle-thin blade made for precise, punishing strikes.

name: Gilded Sabre
description: Beautiful balance, ugly results.

name: Templar Mace
description: A sanctified mace that cracks bone through plate.

name: Shadow Dagger
description: A blade that vanishes at the edge of sight.

name: Knight's Greatsword
description: A heavy two-hander that turns momentum into pain.

name: Storm Bow
description: The string thrums like distant thunder when loosed.

name: Sunforged Spear
description: A bright point that finds hearts in the chaos.

name: Flame-Touched Blade
description: Warm to the touch; it leaves scorched cuts behind.

name: Frost Axe
description: Cold steel that seems to drink the heat from the air.

name: Hexed Scythe
description: A reaper's curve that leaves a lingering chill.

name: Warhammer
description: A heavy hammer that crushes shields and bones alike.

name: Dragonslayer Greatsword
description: A massive blade that feels hungry for monsters.

name: Infernal Cleaver
description: Its edge smokes faintly, as if the metal remembers fire.

name: Bloodletter Axe
description: A brutal axe that seems to hit harder the longer you fight.

name: Titan Maul
description: A two-handed maul capable of crushing shields into splinters.

name: Galestrike Bow
description: Arrows fly straighter—as if the wind itself agrees.

name: Void-Needle Rapier
description: A duelist's weapon that cuts with impossible sharpness.

name: Stariron Halberd
description: A polearm forged from meteoric iron—light, sharp, and deadly.

name: Archmage Staff
description: A staff crowned with a crystal that amplifies will into force.

name: Seraphic Lance
description: A radiant spear that hits like a falling star.

name: Oathbreaker Blade
description: A blackened sword said to punish the weak-willed.

name: Cloth Tunic
description: Simple cloth. Better than nothing, worse than hope.

name: Reed Cape
description: Lightweight and flimsy, but it breaks up silhouettes.

name: Tattered Cloak
description: Offers a whisper of protection.

name: Hide Wraps
description: Tough animal hide bound with rope.

name: Makeshift Helm
description: A dented pot-helm with straps that almost fit.

name: Traveler's Vest
description: Pockets everywhere. Armor nowhere. Still, it helps.

name: Wooden Shield
description: A rough plank shield that can catch a lucky blow.

name: Padded Jacket
description: Layers of cloth and stuffing offer modest protection.

name: Patched Leathers
description: Leather pieces stitched together from old scraps.

name: Thick Wool Coat
description: Warm, bulky, and slightly protective.

name: Iron Greaves
description: Leg guards that keep you standing after nasty hits.

name: Leather Armor
description: Sturdy leather that softens incoming blows.

name: Studded Leather
description: Leather reinforced with metal studs to turn shallow cuts.

name: Kite Shield
description: A broad shield that forgives bad footwork.

name: Reinforced Coat
description: A thick coat with hidden plates sewn inside.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Rings of steel that turn aside glancing blows.

name: Warded Hood
description: Runes stitched into the lining dampen harmful magic.

name: Ringed Mail
description: Mail reinforced with larger rings at vital spots.

name: Scale Armor
description: Overlapping scales that flex and protect.

name: Brigandine
description: Cloth and riveted plates—popular with mercenaries.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: Light armor that muffles movement and dulls incoming force.

name: Plate Armor
description: Full plates of metal that make you a walking fortress.

name: Warded Robes
description: Robes layered with protective sigils and hidden padding.

name: Tower Shield
description: A wall of wood and iron—slow, but very convincing.

name: Half-Plate
description: Plates where it matters most; mobility where it doesn't.

name: Bastion Mail
description: Heavy mail crafted with meticulous, reinforced links.

name: Dragonhide Vest
description: Tough, supple hide that shrugs off punishment.

name: Stormplate Cuirass
description: Plate etched with lightning motifs; it feels oddly buoyant.

name: Gilded Armor
description: Expensive, ornate, and surprisingly functional.

name: Runebound Breastplate
description: Runes flare when danger is near.

name: Aegis Shield
description: A legendary shield that turns aside the worst of a strike.

name: Bulwark Plate
description: So heavy it changes your posture. So strong it changes outcomes.

name: Void Carapace
description: Dark plates that swallow light and soften lethal impacts.

name: Mirrorshade Armor
description: Polished plates that distort distance and intent.

name: Phoenix Mail
description: Warm to the touch; it seems to recover from damage over time.

name: Adamant Shell
description: Unyielding armor that turns you into a walking bunker.

name: Saintly Hauberk
description: A blessed coat of mail that feels lighter than it should.

name: Iron Ring
description: Plain and sturdy. Sometimes that's enough.

name: Bone Amulet
description: A carved bone charm with faint protective meaning.

name: Brass Charm
description: Warm metal that feels reassuring in your palm.

name: Lucky Coin
description: A scuffed coin that somehow ends up in your favor.

name: Minor Vigor Charm
description: A simple charm that keeps your breath steady.

name: Tiny Focus Talisman
description: A knotted cord that helps you concentrate in chaos.

name: Warding Bead
description: A bead etched with ward marks. It doesn't like curses.

name: Amulet of Breath
description: Keeps panic out of your lungs when things get loud.

name: Hunter's Token
description: A tooth charm that sharpens your instincts.

name: Charm of Precision
description: Makes your strikes feel guided, not guessed.

name: Charm of Focus
description: Sharpens your combat instincts.

name: Sage's Thread
description: A silver thread tied around the wrist to steady spellwork.

name: Charm of Vitality
description: A small charm that pulses with life.

name: Charm of Stoneskin
description: Hardens your resolve—and your bruises.

name: Charm of Sparks
description: A tiny coil that crackles with bottled energy.

name: Stoutheart Medallion
description: A heavy medallion that keeps you standing.

name: Charm of the Berserker
description: Its bearer feels a constant urge to strike first and hard.

name: Charm of the Guardian
description: An engraved token said to ward off lethal blows.

name: Moonlit Locket
description: A locket that calms the mind and steadies the body.

name: Charm of the Duelist
description: Rewards clean hits and punishes sloppy defenses.

name: Veteran's Band
description: Worn by survivors. It reminds you how to endure.

name: Talisman of Mending
description: Warmth spreads from it when you take a hit.

name: Ring of the Fortress
description: A thick ring that makes you feel harder to break.

name: Wardstone
description: A pocket-sized stone that hums when danger nears.

name: Amulet of Celerity
description: Your hands move faster than your thoughts can follow.

name: Assassin's Mark
description: A dark stamp that makes your openings feel wider.

name: Sigil of Focus
description: A crisp sigil that amplifies practiced techniques.

name: Ember Heart
description: A coal that never cools; it feeds aggressive magic.

name: Charm of the Adept
description: The crystal at its center hums with contained power.

name: Heartstone
description: A living gem that beats in time with your pulse.

name: Aegis Totem
description: A carved totem that turns fear into protection.

name: Tyrant's Seal
description: A heavy seal that radiates brutal authority.

name: Voidward Charm
description: A charm that dulls both blades and curses.

name: Soul Prism
description: Light refracts inside it in impossible angles.

name: Sunspire Reliquary
description: A reliquary that shines brighter in battle.

name: Battle-Saint's Icon
description: A tiny icon that fills you with stubborn courage.

name: Chronomancer Locket
description: Time feels slightly slower when you focus on it.

name: Stamina Band
description: A leather band that keeps your muscles from tiring.

name: Endurance Belt
description: A wide belt that seems to store energy for when you need it most.

name: Warrior's Band
description: A heavy iron band worn by champions who never tire.

name: Mana Crystal
description: A crystal that hums with stored magical energy.

name: Arcane Focus
description: A polished orb that amplifies your magical reserves.

name: Archmage's Orb
description: A legendary orb that seems to contain infinite potential.
